channel.title: The Positive Mind with Armand DiMele (Psychology)
channel.copyright: ℗ & © 2006 The DiMele Center, New York City
channel.itunes:subtitle: Psychotherapist with 30 years of experience discusses the human mind.
channel.itunes:author: Armand DiMele
channel.itunes:summary: Radio broadcast from WBAI 99.5 in New York
channel.description: Famous psychotherapist Armand DiMele examines human behavior, depression, human sexuality, psychiatric medications and more!
